name: Into the cave of credit card debt
name_original: Into the cave of credit card debt
description:
you have bought a robot making machine but now you are in debt. you must go through the cave to find spider parts to sell so you can pay off that debt. Be careful on your adventurer as if you die that it is the end of that robot so you drop all your spider parts but you can go get your parts back as it is a new beginning for your next robot.

use WASD to move and LMB to fight spiders. pay off your debt in the box to your right
